EmailTemplate.subject: October Direct-TO Newsletter (Part 2)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/big-changes-newsletter-2020]]> Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) – Propulsion <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/honeywell-msp-is-there]]> No Matter How Far Praetor 600 Flies, Honeywell MSP Is There Honeywell is a proud member of the Embraer development team that created the new super-midsize business jet, the Praetor 600...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/honeywell-msp-is-there]]>
Inside the FMS <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/inside-fms-step-climbs-capabilities?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_direct-to_newsletter&utm_content=october]]>Step Climbs and CapabilitiesThis article sheds some light on the original step climb functionality as well as the new capability to plan step climbs using Honeywell’s NG FMS...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/inside-fms-step-climbs-capabilities?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_direct-to_newsletter&utm_content=october]]>
GoDirect Flight Services Update <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/flight-service-update-nextgen-website-features?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_direct-to_newsletter&utm_content=october]]> NextGen Website Features: Route Plotting and Fight Plan Filing This article highlights more changes and features of the NextGen Website: Plotting Flight Plans, Tools, Viewing Routes and Filing the Flight Plan...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/flight-service-update-nextgen-website-features?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_direct-to_newsletter&utm_content=october]]> PIREP <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/pirep-racetrack-patterns?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_direct-to_newsletter&utm_content=october]]> Racetrack Patterns: Automation NOT included The differences between a racetrack pattern and a hold, and how they will look in the FMS...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/pirep-racetrack-patterns?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_direct-to_newsletter&utm_content=october]]> A Heads Up on Heading Logic <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/high-plane-drifter?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_direct-to_newsletter&utm_content=october]]> A look Into Standard Instrument Departures That Call for a Heading to Altitude Leg Pilots operating aircraft using Primus Epic®, Primus Apex®, NZ, or IC Flight Management Systems should be aware of an anomaly that may be encountered while flying certain Standard Instrument Departures...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/10/high-plane-drifter?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_direct-to_newsletter&utm_content=october]]>
